law.text: Any person who violates KRS 304.12-275 shall be subject, at the discretion of the commissioner, to a fine in an amount of not less than two hundred fifty dollars ($250) nor more than five thousand dollars ($5,000). Each violation shall constitute a separate offense.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2012.
